frontmatter.title: London 2019
frontmatter.lead_text: This OpenShift Commons Gathering will be located in London at the The Savoy Place!
frontmatter.info_text: The OpenShift Commons Gathering brings together experts from all over the world to discuss container technologies, best practices for cloud native application developers and the open source software projects that underpin the OpenShift ecosystem. The London event will gather developers, devops professionals and sysadmins together to explore the next steps in making container technologies successful and secure.
frontmatter.event_footer_text: In addition to the day-long Gathering, we will also be hosting a 1/2 day Kubernetes Operator Framework Hands-on Workshop from 8 am to noon. Workshop space is limited to 45 seats.

schedule.session_name: Welcome to the Commons: Making Collaboration that Works - Diane Mueller, Red Hat
Keynote: State of the Union - OpenShift and the Unified Hybrid Cloud
Lightning Talks: Crunchy Data, Devoteam, Pure Storage, Redis Labs, Portworx, Aqua Security
Lightning Talks: Microsoft, NGINX, StorageOS, Tremolo Security, Sysdig, Dynatrace
Case Study: Open Source @ Credit Suisse
State of Serverless: Kubernetes, Istio, Knative, Kiali and beyond
State of the Operators: Framework, SDK, and beyond
AMA Panel with OpenShift PM team members and engineers
The Road Ahead: OpenShift, Kubernetes and Beyond
